cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2471, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 63 (Tuesday, April 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JEFFRIES:
H.R. 2471.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18, to make all laws which
shall be necessary and proper for carrying into execution the
foregoing powers, and all other powers vested by the
Constitution in the Government of the United States, or in
any Departent or Officer thereof.
[Page H1737]

notes.text: The House Rules Committee Print, joint explanatory statements, and H.Rept. 117-269 from the House Rules Committee are available.

title: Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022
